name: wav-ocs-cruise-game
description:
Here is the followup game in the OCS series:

Today our adventure is taking place aboard a cruise ship in the middle of the ocean as a wheelchair user attempts to navigate their way around a series of obstacles to finish each level.

There are nine levels which get harder as you go so be careful or you could be going for an early bath if you slip off the side. You will restart each level if you manage to hit any of the obstacles so the moral of the story is go steady, keep your calm and dont rush!!!

There is a pause menu - try and find it on the screen, it will take the player to the menus where you can decide how brave you want to be. Do you want to do level 9 straight away or take it easy and build up your experience levels until you reach the final destination.

At the end of the day have fun and enjoy -
